name: Sir Jim Ratcliffe
expandedText: Sir Jim Ratcliffe is the founder of Ineos, a multinational chemicals company. Born in 1952, he built Ineos into one of the world’s largest chemical manufacturers. His business empire spans multiple industries, including oil and gas, sports, and automotive. He has been recognized as one of the UK’s most influential business figures.

name: Sir James Dyson
expandedText: Sir James Dyson is the British entrepreneur behind the revolutionary Dyson vacuum cleaner. A pioneer in engineering, he has expanded his company into air purifiers, hair care, and robotics. With a focus on innovation, Dyson continues to lead in high-tech consumer products.
